mapper.update: update t_stock set normal_quantity = normal_quantity - #{normalQuantity} where product_id=#{productId}
update t_stock set normal_quantity = normal_quantity + #{normalQuantity} where product_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select p.id,p.product_name,p.bar_code,p.product_code,p.product_unit,p.stock_warn, IFNULL(s.normal_quantity,0) as normal_quantity from t_product p LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,SUM(normal_quantity) as normal_quantity from t_stock GROUP BY product_id) s ON s.product_id = p.id
